           <div id="the-basics" class="topic_area"> 
            <h2 class="topic_area_title syndicate">The Basics</h2> 
            <div class="pages"> 
             <div class="page" id="page_70"> 
              <h2 class="topic_page_title">The Basics: <span>Overview</span></h2> 
              <div class="syndicate"> 
               <p>Regular physical activity is good for everyone's health! Physical activity is anything that gets your body moving. Aim for 2 hours and 30 minutes of moderate activity each week.</p>
               <p>If you haven't been active before, start at a comfortable level. Once you get the hang of it, add a little more activity each time. Then try getting active more often.</p>
               <h3>What kinds of activity should I do?</h3>
               <p>To get all the health benefits of physical activity, do a combination of aerobic and muscle-strengthening activities.</p>
               <ul>
                <li><strong>Aerobic</strong> (air-OH-bik) activities make you breathe harder and cause your heart to beat faster. Walking fast is an example of aerobic activity.</li>
                <li><strong>Muscle-strengthening</strong> activities make your muscles stronger. Muscle-strengthening activities include lifting weights, using resistance bands, and doing push-ups.</li>
               </ul>
               <p>Use these resources to learn more about physical activity for:</p>
               <ul>
                <li><a href="https://health.gov/PAGuidelines/pdf/adultguide.pdf" target="_blank">Adults [PDF - 1.1 MB]</a></li>
                <li><a href="http://go4life.nia.nih.gov/get-started" target="_blank">Older adults</a></li>
                <li><a href="http://www.cdc.gov/physicalactivity/everyone/guidelines/children.html" target="_blank">Children</a></li>
                <li><a href="https://www.nhlbi.nih.gov/health/educational/wecan/get-active/family-active-time.htm" target="_blank">Families</a></li>
                <li><a href="https://www.cdc.gov/physicalactivity/basics/pregnancy/index.htm" target="_blank">Pregnant women or women who just had a baby</a></li>
               </ul> 
              </div> 
              <div id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_topic_navigation_0" class="topic_navigation clearfix"> 
               <div class="content_page_navigation clearfix"> 
                <span class="content_page_link right"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pageNextLabel_0" class="pageHeading">Next section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pageNext_0" class="button next" href="#the-basics_2">Health Benefits</a> </span> 
                <span class="content_page_link left"> </span> 
                <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pageRange_0" class="content_page_range">1 of 8 sections</span> 
               </div> 
              </div> 
              <!-- /.topic_navigation --> 
             </div> 
             <div class="page" id="page_437"> 
              <h2 class="topic_page_title">The Basics: <span>Health Benefits</span></h2> 
              <div class="syndicate"> 
               <h3>What are the benefits of physical activity?</h3>
               <p>Physical activity increases your chances of living longer. It can also help:</p>
               <ul>
                <li>Control your blood pressure, blood sugar, and weight</li>
                <li>Lower your bad cholesterol and raise your good cholesterol</li>
                <li>Prevent heart disease, colorectal cancer, breast cancer, and type 2 diabetes</li>
               </ul>
               <p>And thats not all. Being more active can:</p>
               <ul>
                <li>Be fun</li>
                <li>Help you sleep better</li>
                <li>Make your bones, muscles, and joints stronger</li>
                <li>Lower your chances of becoming depressed</li>
                <li>Reduce falls and arthritis pain</li>
                <li>Help you feel better about yourself</li>
               </ul>
               <h3>Is physical activity for everyone?</h3>
               <p>Yes! Physical activity is good for people of all ages and body types. Even if you feel out of shape or you havent been active in a long time, you can find activities that will work for you.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_topic_navigation_1" class="topic_navigation clearfix"> 
               <div class="content_page_navigation clearfix"> 
                <span class="content_page_link right"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pageNextLabel_1" class="pageHeading">Next section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pageNext_1" class="button next" href="#the-basics_3">Health Conditions</a> </span> 
                <span class="content_page_link left"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pagePrevLabel_1" class="pageHeading">Previous section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pagePrev_1" class="button previous" href="#the-basics_1">Overview</a> </span> 
                <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pageRange_1" class="content_page_range">2 of 8 sections</span> 
               </div> 
              </div> 
              <!-- /.topic_navigation --> 
             </div> 
             <div class="page" id="page_265"> 
              <h2 class="topic_page_title">The Basics: <span>Health Conditions</span></h2> 
              <div class="syndicate"> 
               <h3>What if Im overweight?</h3>
               <p>If you are overweight or obese, getting active can help you lower your risk of:</p>
               <ul>
                <li>Type 2 diabetes</li>
                <li>High blood pressure</li>
                <li>Heart disease</li>
                <li>Stroke</li>
                <li>Some types of cancer</li>
               </ul>
               <p><a href="http://win.niddk.nih.gov/publications/active.htm" target="_blank">Find out more about how you can be active at any size</a>.</p>
               <h3>What if I have a health condition?</h3>
               <p>If you have a health condition&nbsp;like type 2 diabetes or high blood pressure, physical activity can help you manage it.&nbsp;Ask your&nbsp;doctor what types of activity are best for you.</p>
               <ul>
                <li><a href="http://www.niddk.nih.gov/health-information/health-topics/Diabetes/physical-activity-diabetes/Pages/physical-activity-diabetes.aspx" target="_blank">Get tips on physical activity and diabetes</a></li>
                <li><a href="http://www.nhlbi.nih.gov/health/health-topics/topics/hbp/treatment#PhysicalActivity" target="_blank">Learn how physical activity helps high blood pressure</a></li>
               </ul>
               <h3>What if I have a disability?</h3>
               <p>If you have a disability, your doctor can help you choose the best activities for you. You can also <a href="/HealthTopics/Category/health-conditions-and-diseases/obesity/stay-active-with-a-disability-quick-tips">use these tips to stay active with a disability</a>.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_topic_navigation_2" class="topic_navigation clearfix"> 
               <div class="content_page_navigation clearfix"> 
                <span class="content_page_link right"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pageNextLabel_2" class="pageHeading">Next section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pageNext_2" class="button next" href="#take-action_1">Get Started</a> </span> 
                <span class="content_page_link left"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pagePrevLabel_2" class="pageHeading">Previous section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pagePrev_2" class="button previous" href="#the-basics_2">Health Benefits</a> </span> 
                <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_0_pageRange_2" class="content_page_range">3 of 8 sections</span> 
               </div> 
              </div> 
              <!-- /.topic_navigation -->

           <div id="take-action" class="topic_area"> 
            <h2 class="topic_area_title syndicate">Take Action!</h2> 
            <div class="pages"> 
             <div class="page" id="page_259"> 
              <h2 class="topic_page_title">Take Action: <span>Get Started</span></h2> 
              <div class="syndicate"> 
               <h3>Start slowly.</h3>
               <p>If you haven't been active before, start out slowly and add new physical activities little by little. After a few weeks or months, do them longer and more often. If you arent sure where to start, <a href="http://www.cdc.gov/physicalactivity/downloads/pa_examples.pdf" target="_blank">check out these examples of physical activity plans [PDF&nbsp;-&nbsp;78&nbsp;KB]</a>.</p>
               <p>For help getting motivated, <a href="https://www.supertracker.usda.gov/PalaPlus.aspx" target="_blank">sign up for the Presidential Active Lifestyle Award (PALA+) challenge</a>.</p>
               <h3>Choose activities that you enjoy.</h3>
               <p>Team up with a friend or join a fitness class. Ask your family and friends to be active with you. Play games like tennis or basketball, or take a class in dance or martial arts.</p>
               <p>Everyday activities can add up to an active lifestyle. You can:</p>
               <ul>
                <li>Go for a brisk walk around the neighborhood</li>
                <li>Ride a bicycle to work or just for fun</li>
                <li>Play outdoor games with your children</li>
                <li><a href="http://www.niddk.nih.gov/health-information/health-topics/weight-control/tips-help-get-active/Pages/tips-help-you-get-active.aspx" target="_blank">Use these tips on getting active</a></li>
               </ul>
               <h3>Have fun with your family.</h3>
               <p>If you have children, you can be a role model for making healthy choices. Encourage your whole family to get active outside  go for a hike or organize a family soccer game.</p>
               <p>If someone you know has trouble making time for physical activity,&nbsp;<a href="/HealthTopics/Category/health-conditions-and-diseases/diabetes/help-a-loved-one-get-more-active-quick-tips">use these tips to help your loved one get more active</a>.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_topic_navigation_0" class="topic_navigation clearfix"> 
               <div class="content_page_navigation clearfix"> 
                <span class="content_page_link right"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageNextLabel_0" class="pageHeading">Next section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageNext_0" class="button next" href="#take-action_2">Build Muscles</a> </span> 
                <span class="content_page_link left"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pagePrevLabel_0" class="pageHeading">Previous section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pagePrev_0" class="button previous" href="#the-basics_3">Health Conditions</a> </span> 
                <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageRange_0" class="content_page_range">4 of 8 sections</span> 
               </div> 
              </div> 
              <!-- /.topic_navigation --> 
             </div> 
             <div class="page" id="page_263"> 
              <h2 class="topic_page_title">Take Action: <span>Build Muscles</span></h2> 
              <div class="syndicate"> 
               <h3>Strengthen your muscles.</h3>
               <p>Try some of these activities a few days a week:</p>
               <ul>
                <li>Crunches (sit-ups)</li>
                <li>Heavy gardening, like&nbsp;digging or shoveling</li>
                <li>Doing push-ups on the floor or against the wall</li>
                <li>Lifting small weights &nbsp;you can even use bottled water or cans of food as weights</li>
               </ul>
               <p><a href="http://www.cdc.gov/physicalactivity/everyone/videos/index.html" target="_blank">Watch these videos for muscle strengthening exercises</a> to do at home or at the gym.</p>
               <p>If you do muscle-strengthening activities with weights,&nbsp;<a href="http://www.mayoclinic.org/healthy-lifestyle/fitness/in-depth/weight-training/art-20045842?p=1" target="_blank">check out the dos and donts of training with weights</a>.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_topic_navigation_1" class="topic_navigation clearfix"> 
               <div class="content_page_navigation clearfix"> 
                <span class="content_page_link right"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageNextLabel_1" class="pageHeading">Next section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageNext_1" class="button next" href="#take-action_3">Track Progress</a> </span> 
                <span class="content_page_link left"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pagePrevLabel_1" class="pageHeading">Previous section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pagePrev_1" class="button previous" href="#take-action_1">Get Started</a> </span> 
                <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageRange_1" class="content_page_range">5 of 8 sections</span> 
               </div> 
              </div> 
              <!-- /.topic_navigation --> 
             </div> 
             <div class="page" id="page_264"> 
              <h2 class="topic_page_title">Take Action: <span>Track Progress</span></h2> 
              <div class="syndicate"> 
               <h3>Track your progress.</h3>
               <p><a href="https://health.gov/paguidelines/guidelines/keepingtrack.pdf">Use this activity log to keep track of your physical activity [PDF - 170 KB]</a>. Write down your goals and track your activities each week. As you get more active, you can set higher goals!</p>
               <h3>Use a pedometer.</h3>
               <p>A pedometer clips onto your belt or waistband and counts the&nbsp;number of steps you take. Make it your goal to take at least 10,000 steps a day.&nbsp;Increase the number of steps you&nbsp;take each day until you reach your goal.</p>
               <p><img alt="Red Pedometer" src="/HealthTopics/glmedia/icons/red_pedometer.gif"><br>A pedometer counts the number of steps you take.</p>
               <h3>Be realistic.</h3>
               <p>Remember, its not all or nothing. Even 10 minutes of activity is better than none!</p>
               <p>Find a time that works for you. See if you can fit in 10 minutes of activity before work or after dinner.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_topic_navigation_2" class="topic_navigation clearfix"> 
               <div class="content_page_navigation clearfix"> 
                <span class="content_page_link right"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageNextLabel_2" class="pageHeading">Next section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageNext_2" class="button next" href="#take-action_4">Add More Activity</a> </span> 
                <span class="content_page_link left"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pagePrevLabel_2" class="pageHeading">Previous section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pagePrev_2" class="button previous" href="#take-action_2">Build Muscles</a> </span> 
                <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageRange_2" class="content_page_range">6 of 8 sections</span> 
               </div> 
              </div> 
              <!-- /.topic_navigation --> 
             </div> 
             <div class="page" id="page_260"> 
              <h2 class="topic_page_title">Take Action: <span>Add More Activity</span></h2> 
              <div class="syndicate"> 
               <h3>Get ready to get more active.</h3>
               <p>You may already be feeling the benefits of getting active, such as sleeping better or getting stronger.</p>
               <p>Here are 2 ways to add more activity to your life:</p>
               <ul>
                <li><strong>Be active for longer each time.&nbsp;</strong>If you are walking 3 days a week for 30 minutes, try walking for an additional 10 minutes or more each day.</li>
                <li><strong>Be active more often.&nbsp;</strong>If you are riding your bike to work 2 days a week, try riding your bike to work 4 days a week.</li>
               </ul>
               <h3>Find time in your schedule.</h3>
               <p>Look at your schedule for the week. Find a few 30-minute time periods you can use for more physical activity. Put them in your calendar. <a href="http://www.nhlbi.nih.gov/health/public/heart/obesity/wecan/get-active/activity-plan.htm" target="_blank">Try these ways to build more active time into your busy week</a>.</p> 
              </div> 
              <div id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_topic_navigation_3" class="topic_navigation clearfix"> 
               <div class="content_page_navigation clearfix"> 
                <span class="content_page_link right"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageNextLabel_3" class="pageHeading">Next section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageNext_3" class="button next" href="#take-action_5">Challenge Yourself</a> </span> 
                <span class="content_page_link left"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pagePrevLabel_3" class="pageHeading">Previous section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pagePrev_3" class="button previous" href="#take-action_3">Track Progress</a> </span> 
                <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageRange_3" class="content_page_range">7 of 8 sections</span> 
               </div> 
              </div> 
              <!-- /.topic_navigation --> 
             </div> 
             <div class="page" id="page_261"> 
              <h2 class="topic_page_title">Take Action: <span>Challenge Yourself</span></h2> 
              <div class="syndicate"> 
               <h3>Once you've started, keep it up.</h3>
               <p>If you are already active for 2 hours and 30 minutes each week, you can get even more health benefits by stepping up your routine.</p>
               <p>Getting more physical&nbsp;activity can further lower your risk for:</p>
               <ul>
                <li>Heart disease</li>
                <li>Type 2 diabetes</li>
                <li>Breast cancer</li>
                <li>Colorectal cancer</li>
               </ul>
               <h3>Do more vigorous activities.</h3>
               <p>In general, 15 minutes of vigorous activity has the same benefits as 30 minutes of moderate activity. Try jogging for 15 minutes instead of walking for 30&nbsp;minutes.</p>
               <h4>Mix it up.</h4>
               <p>Mix vigorous activities with moderate ones. Try joining a fitness group or gym class. Dont forget to do muscle-strengthening activities 2 days a week.</p>
               <h3>Challenge yourself.</h3>
               <p><a href="https://www.supertracker.usda.gov/PresidentialChampions.aspx" target="_blank">Check out the Presidential Champions program</a> to get personalized activity logs, training tips, and more. See just how high you can raise your activity level!</p> 
              </div> 
              <div id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_topic_navigation_4" class="topic_navigation clearfix"> 
               <div class="content_page_navigation clearfix"> 
                <span class="content_page_link right"> </span> 
                <span class="content_page_link left"> <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pagePrevLabel_4" class="pageHeading">Previous section</span> <a id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pagePrev_4" class="button previous" href="#take-action_4">Add More Activity</a> </span> 
                <span id="content_tabContentRepeater_areaContentRepeater_1_pageRange_4" class="content_page_range">8 of 8 sections</span> 
               </div> 
              </div> 
              <!-- /.topic_navigation --> 
             </div>
